titles.title: Lord I Come Before Your Throne of Grace

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, I come before Your throne of grace;
I find rest in Your presence, and fullness of joy.
In worship and wonder I behold Your face,
Singing what a faithful God have I.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
What a faithful God have I,
What a faithful God.
What a faithful God have I,
Faithful in every way.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord of mercy, You have heard my cry;
Through the storm You're the beacon,
My song in the night.
In the shelter of Your wings,
Hear my heart's reply,
Singing what a faithful God have I.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lord all sov'reign, granting peace from heav'n,
Let me comfort those who suffer
With the comfort You have given.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I will tell of Your great love
For as long as I live,
Singing what a faithful God have I.
